籤詩版本二:
Ngezikhathi zesomiso, wonke amasimu abunile.Bongani uNkulunkulu ngemvula emnandi.
Izimbali, izithelo, nohlaza konke kunomswakama, futhi ngiyaqaphela ukuthi imvula eyodwa ibiza izingcezu eziyinkulungwane zegolide.
詩意:
Le hexagram iwuphawu lwesomiso nemvula emnandi.
Kubo bonke ubunzima kukhona insindiso.
解曰:
Izikelemu zasensimini zivuthwe ngokuphindwe kabili. Isiphetho siza kancane kancane. Isifo sihlangana nomuthi omuhle. Ukuphazamiseka kwabahamba ngezinyawo.
(Akunankinga → Uxolo.)
籤詩故事一:
◇I-Rokuro ilondoloziwe
U-Yang Yanzhao (958-1014) wayeyindodana yesithupha ka-Yang Ye. Igama lakhe langempela kwakungu-Yanlang, owaziwa nangokuthi u-Yang Liulang. Wazalwa onyakeni wesihlanu ka-Zhou Xiande (958) ngemva Kwezizukulwane Ezinhlanu. Wayedabuka e-Linzhou (manje uShenmu, uShaanxi).
U-Yang Ye wahola amabutho amathathu futhi wayezungezwe ibutho labalandeli u-Yang Ye washaya ikhanda lakhe phezu kwetshe lesikhumbuzo lika-Li Ling wafa.
U-Yang Qilang ucele usizo futhi wadutshulwa washona umcibisholo. U-Liulang wahlehla waya e-Hulu Valley. Watakulwa indela eNtabeni iWutai (Yang Wulang) futhi wayengaphandle kwengozi.
(Indela isiza. Lesi isingathekiso semvula efika ngesikhathi.)
聖意: Thandazela ikhaya lakho nomuzi wakho ukuthi uzivikele, ufune ingcebo, ube nezivumelwano ezinhle, uphuze umshado, futhi ushade eLiujia. Abahamba ngezinyawo besifazane bayoba nezingqinamba ensimini, izikelemu, izilwane eziyisithupha, nokuthola abantu.Kuzoba nzima ukuthola abantu Ukumangalela, ukulahlekelwa, ukufuduka, ukulondolozwa kwemvelo, impahla elahlekile, intshonalanga (qaphela: inyakatho ingeyamanzi, futhi intshonalanga ingeyegolide) Izifo zinikezwa (zizolapheka) ) Shanfen Anji
